name: silver.sliver
description:
.:.
This photochemical process is an attempt to catch the sliver of a light of two beings, meeting in a creative endeavor. the shadow behind the lense} & the exposed one. For all light ontologically has the same source.. buried in mystery where secrets and silence meets

flashbulbs and chemical reactions permit an unveiling threw crystalised silver being melted by the light itself. Put in relation with cryptoarts, it exposes the bond between momentum, time and space explored both cryptographically and with traditional photography


.:.
As a first crypto.art &nft share, the objkt can be felt as an historical encounter of different eras threw post.modern artistic expressions, a poetic testimony of the same Will to make, share and preserve that transcends epoch 
.:.
